messages.message:
Hi all -- I wanted to float an idea about how we set up development environments for developers by default:

Using a Local Database by Default in Developer Environments (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1GH6QDANK1bADaVeftpwEMVCx048wADsstT_awhZytRo/edit)

Since this affects a lot of people (particularly frontend devs who do not usually run local databases), I would like to have a discussion first to address any concerns. Please feel free to leave comments in the doc above.

Thanks!
